page.title: 08Transport in Tiverton area
page.content: We do not have very good public transport. There are Devon General buses which are the cheapest type but they are uncomfortable. Other Bus companies such as Kingdom's Coaches can provide hired transport. They often get used by sports clubs etc. There are a few train services which stop at Tiverton Junction but this seven miles away from the town centre! The town has some taxis as well but it is expensive to keep using them. Quite a lot of people have cars of their own and a lot of the older boys have motor bikes.
